Reference

All functions

add_boundary_box()

Add a bounding box around observations at specified coordinates

add_colour_bar()

Add a colour bar legend to a plot

add_error_bars()

Add error bars to a plot

add_error_envelope()

Add a regression line and an error envelope to a plot

add_grid_rect_xy()

Add a regular, rectangular grid to a plot at user-specified positions

add_lagging_point_zero()

Add lagging .0(s) to a number

add_lines()

Add lines to a plot

add_model_predictions()

(depreciated) Add model predictions (including fitted values and confidence intervals) to a plot

add_moons()

Add subplots of the lunar phase to a plot

add_north_arrow()

Add a North arrow to a map

add_profile_lat()

Add a latitudinal profile to a raster plot

add_shading_bar()

Add shading to a plot

add_shading_quantiles()

Add shading for the quantiles of observed variation to a plot

add_sp_points() add_sp_line() add_sp_path() add_sp_poly() add_sp_raster() add_sp_grid_ll()

Add spatial layers to a background map

crop_aggr_utm()

Crop, aggregate and reproject rasters for 3d visualisation

dat_coast_around_oban

The coastline around Oban

dat_flapper

A sample of flapper skate depth and temperature time series

dat_gebco

The bathymetry around Oban

define_time_blocks()

Define time blocks (i.e. diel periods or seasons)

min_factor() max_factor() range_factor()

Factor extremes

implement_mtext_args()

Implement mtext_args

implement_pretty_axis_args()

Implement pretty_axis_args

list_CIs()

Define a list containing fitted values and confidence intervals for the linear predictor or response from a model

par_mf()

Define par's mfrow or mfcol arguments to fit n plots on a single page

par_tri()

Plot the lower/upper triangle of a multi-plot square matrix

pi_notation()

\(\pi\) notation

prettyGraphics

prettyGraphics: Prettier graphics made easier in R

pretty_axis()

Define pretty limits and axes for publication-quality plots

pretty_boxplot()

Pretty boxplots

pretty_cols_brewer()

Create pretty colour schemes

pretty_cols_split_heat()

Create the `split-heat' colour scheme

pretty_curve()

Pretty function plots

pretty_hist()

Pretty histograms

pretty_line()

Plot a (pretty) number line or timeline

pretty_map()

Pretty maps

pretty_map_from_file_raster()

Pretty raster maps from file

pretty_mat()

Plot pretty matrices

pretty_panel()

Pretty grouped, multi-panel plots

pretty_pgram()

Pretty periodogram plots

pretty_plot()

Prettier default plots

pretty_predictions_1d()

Pretty one-dimensional predictions

pretty_predictions_2d()

Pretty two-dimensional predictions

pretty_residuals()

Diagnostic plots of model residuals

pretty_scape_3d()

Interactive 3d plots of landscapes or seascapes using plot_ly

pretty_seq()

Define a pretty sequence given data, limits and pretty parameters

pretty_smooth_1d()

Plot pretty one dimensional smooths

pretty_smooth_2d()

Pretty two-dimensional smooths

pretty_ts()

Create publication-quality plots

pretty_ts_mat()

Visualise the within and between day variation in a time series

sci_notation()

Tidy scientific notation

summarise_by_lat()

Summarise a raster by latitude

summarise_in_bins()

Summarise continuous data in bins

tidy_numbers()

Tidy number columns in a dataframe

tidy_write()

Write `tidy' tables to file

vis_scape_3d()

An interactive R Shiny exploration of 3d landscapes or seascapes

vis_ts()

Visualise one dimensional time series via R Shiny
